website_summaries.verdict: A budget pick with features that keep the cover in place during rough weather. Praised for water resistance, but some dispute whether it's truly waterproof.
pros: Durable double-stitched nylon Oxford cover fits bikes up to a generous 108 inches
Elastic bottom panels and clips keep windproof cover in place
Fits many motorcycles even with the windshield attached
Lightweight so that it's easy to install and remove, but still gets the job done
cons: Some users report cover may leak around the seams
Consider adding seam sealer or waterproofing

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, great cover.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research about this before I bought it. It is a GREAT PRODUCT for how much it costs. I have a 2008 Harley Dyna, with hard bags, and it covered it perfectly. If your bike is any larger, or has apes, this cover might not work for you. A lot of people were saying that this cover is not waterproof... IT IS WATERPROOF. I covered my bike and it rained for 3 days afterwards. I did have a few drops of water on my bike, but it was from CONDENSATION under the cover. The cover itself did NOT leak. Thick, heavy material. I feel this cover will last a while! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this soley to protect his bike from the elements as we have no garage. He has covered his bike maybe 10 times with it when not in use. Today when he took it off to ride to work the bike was soaked. Every inch of it was wet and he has to spend time drying it off before leaving. This cover is supposed to be water proof and clearly is not. If you just want a nice looking cover to throw over it in a garage then sure. If you are looking for a waterproof cover then keep looking
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Keeney

customer_reviews.title: Fits Large Bike
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these covers for HD Roadking with full windshield & tourpack-it covers the whole bike, is just a little short vertically ...I like the cover to go below the tire, it’s a bit short. Also bought cover for HD Heritage Classic-fits the same. Looks like good quality, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: AKnAK

customer_reviews.title: Good cover...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cover. Factor in the price.. and you could even say it’s “great”. It’s not as heavy duty as the Gaurdian cover I’m replacing.. that lasted 7 years. This will prob last 1-2 seasons. But for the price.. it’s totslly worth it. It rained for ya days and my bike stayed dry. The fit of the XXL fits my 2012Triumph Thunderbird perfectly even with the windshield, saddlebags, and sissy bar. And there’s quick connect straps that secure thru the wheels to help keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Ample cover of appearant good quality.
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks of covering my 2015 VStrom w/ factory panniers, I am very pleased with this cover. It was the same price as my previous cover but the build quality is superior for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: NO WARRANTY, CHEAP MATERIAL
customer_reviews.text: This cover started to deteriorate within 3 or 4 months after I bought it. After 10 months the cover ripped. I contact the seller regarding the 1 year warranty and they never replied. They will only reply if you actually will buy one, but for warranty there is no answer. Beware, cheap material and poor/non-existence customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Color Fades in Direct Sun and Didn't Last a Year
customer_reviews.text: Price point considered, I rate it 3 stars. If it were double the money, I'd give it 1 star. It fit well (Honda CB500X with side bags). It looks really good until the black began fading in about 3 months. In 6 months, it looked quite bad. In 8 months, the strap had rotted off. By 10 months it developed a long split, front to back, right down the top middle. Oddly, this split began right over the seat in a non stress area. The large grommets on the front of the cover are not paint friendly. I can not recommend this cover for outside use in sunny regions as it just doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbur

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. And large enough for a bike ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. And large enough for a bike with windsheild and bags. At this price, if it only lasts a year, it was still worth it!
customer_reviews.author: R. Brashear

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cover, I could not ask for more when paying for less. It downpour everyday where I live, at the tropic, a few minutes later is hot as the worst dry season. Use it on my Yamaha Bolt, fits perfectly, but need to extend it properly so pools of water does not form over the cover, that is when water can pass through. When it is extended properly, no water passthrough, and can dry very fast to take it over. Use everyday at work, it is just perfect, it has keep its color over 3 months. Let see at dry summer, but I don’t regret it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar A. Barroso

customer_reviews.title: This cover is more waterproof (100%) than the last one ...
customer_reviews.text: This cover is more waterproof (100%) than the last one I bought (cloth). The over-sized grommets make locking it to the front tire very quick and simple. No chain or cable required. Have not exposed it to a hot engine or exhaust pipe because duh. Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Haston

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when it was new. I could cover my entire Honda Africa Twin with saddlebags attached, and it packed up pretty small with the included storage sack. After some months, though, the seam tape came loose from the inside all over and I had to just tear pieces of that tape off. Now after one year, one of the buckles has come unattached at the seam. Perhaps if the moto was stored and covered inside, the cover would have lasted longer. But, then I probably wouldn't need a cover. It's now serving as minimal protection while I search for a better one.
customer_reviews.author: El Skillet

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I buckled the clips together they tore right away from the fabric stitching wasn't even complete it was put together like it was made in an illegal sweatshop or something completely disappointed so upset that I wasted my money on that piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Yes it will fit your bike. Read the reviews then you won't have to post a question.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new cover for my Soft tail. Excellent fit even with windshield and saddle bags. It fits my full sized Harley Davidson with a full sized windshield and large leather saddle bags. It will fit your bike too unless it is a 6 cylinder monster or 350 cubic inch Boss Hoss, then maybe it won't.
customer_reviews.author: Jelly

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job at first. a little big for my gsxr 600. I’ve had it for a year, the cover is completely faded and now Has about 10 rips one going the length of the bike. I use the cover for my bike outside during spring, summer and fall before putting it up for the winter. If you don’t get any wind or weather of any kind, this cover is good enough for outside use or if u use it as a cover for your bike while in the garage
customer_reviews.author: Shawna  poulin

customer_reviews.title: Rips WAY too easily and not the best fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 108" cover for my less than 100" motorcycle (Unless the info I read about my bike was incorrect) and it's a very tight fit. Add to that, while I was putting it on it caught my mirror and ripped a hole through. I have a real hard time calling this a high quality cover if it rips that incredibly easy. But it looks nice! ...in the front anyway
customer_reviews.author: Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Not XXL
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this motorcycle cover is good. It seems well made with decent materials. It rained yesterday and it does in fact appear to be waterproof. My problem is that it's supposedly an "XXL" that should have fit my 2016 HD street glide. It almost fits. It covers it enough that it goes down to the fenders, not all the way to the ground like it should. Just keep that in mind if you are shopping for a cover for a large, full size motorcycle. This isn't the cover for you, if you have anything smaller than a Street Glide, you'll likely be very happy with this inexpensive yet well made cover.
customer_reviews.author: JR Fairfax

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cover - Wrong color sent - Good dust cover.
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is... cheap. It is being used to cover my 86 Harley Davidson FXR Super Glide inside a garage. Mainly during the winter months as a dust cover. If I needed an outdoor weather proof cover, I personally would probably skip this one since it is very thin and I can't see it standing up to UV abuse for very long. They sent me the wrong color and honestly for how cheap this cover was I felt it wasn't worth my effort to return for exchange. It fits my bike well but as mentioned very thin material. If you need a dust cover inside a garage it's a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Wprks
customer_reviews.text: This cover works well on my VTX1300 with windshield and honda bags. They took our road down to the dirt. And, after a week of dust flying shes still clean. After rain shes dry. I like that is has 2 straps for holding it in place. Unfortunately after a couple of months the front strap has come loose from the seam. I also wish it was just a bit taller. Which I could have ordered the next size up. I gave it 4 stars mainly because of the strap that came loose. I dont believe you will be disappointed with these covers.
customer_reviews.author: Giftsbuyussc

customer_reviews.title: Initial quality: disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The material feels like a cheap tent you’d get at Walmart. The metal in the grommet is so thin I can’t imagine it’ll last in any kind of wind. I can’t imagine how this is an “all season” weatherproof tarp. It’s so off from expectation that part of me thinks they sent me the wrong cover I’ll update this review after putting the cover to some real world use, but the initial quality is so disappointing I wanted to post a review. (Basis of opinion: 20+ years of riding.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Well made and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for my Yamaha VStar 950 Tourer (I only have the bags on, with no rear seat, sissy bar, or windshield.) The fit was tight, and I didn’t want to struggle with it, so I swapped it with the one I had on my Kawasaki Vulcan 800a. It fits more comfortably on that, and is a good cover. I garage my bikes, but like to have them covered, especially for winter storage. I would buy this cover again. Well made, and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are nice when they are new, but don’t hold up to the sun very well. I use mine in the sun daily. Not too sure about the warranty card. When I tried to register it put me in a loop to the point I got frustrated and gave up. It is the second one I’ve purchased, first one lasted 6 months. Which for $25 isn’t that hateful. As long as you know that, it’s no big deal. Spend $50 per year to cover your bike. Warranty? Maybe you’ll have better luck than I did.
customer_reviews.author: Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Good to use, hard to store
customer_reviews.text: This cover is perfect to keep your bike covered and dry, however I would advise using it in a city where its windy. Ive seen bikes fall over because the cover catches too much wind on some days. The cover is also hard to fold and put back in the bag that it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Saagar

customer_reviews.title: light and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cover as it is waterproof (really!), and very light weight. It is very durable too. This is my second cover I purchased but the first was still good although starting to kind of "go" after two years. Just got very faded and seemed that it wouldn't hold much longer (this was after 2 years of use) so I gave it away when I sold my bike I used it with, but who knows? I purchased another bike and I bought the same exact cover as I was satisfied with the first one. The only thing that could be a little better: more fitting for the wheels
customer_reviews.author: Réka Domokos

customer_reviews.title: Fits Honda Helix perfect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a Honda Helix with rear trunk, and the fit is absolutely perfect, like it was made for it. Wasn't thinking & placed over bike after I finished riding, and the muffler melted a hole in it. Completely my mistake, but the shipper promptly sent out a replacement, so that was am awesome thing to do. Not really easy to fold by yourself, had to kind of wad it up to git it in the trunk, but it was definitely easy to handle. Glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Everything you need for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Everything you need for the money. I bought a different brand previously for the same price and the other product wasn't even practical. This one is simple and smart engineering. Large enough for my 1200 sportster and had two sets of snap in buckles to go under the front and rear tires. That's all you need and the material is solid.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Item did not fit my bike which was under the 108" size they listed unless the front wheel was straight. I contacted the company and their response was very quick they said they were sending the next size bigger. Been two weeks still nothing. I'm a little disappointed because it seemed to be a very nice cover. I was going to return it but gave it to my neighbor for his mopad. My loss his gain.
customer_reviews.author: roger c.

customer_reviews.title: Straps dont hold
customer_reviews.text: It's not yellow as pictured, its Harley orange. I have a yellow bike... it has 2 straps to keep the cover on. The first storm tore the stitches out, cover blew across the parking lot and I woke up to my bike covered In snow..
customer_reviews.author: Justin Credible

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover!
customer_reviews.text: I am traveling full time in our motorhome and have our Victory Kingpin with us on a hydraulic lift. My old cover got torn after three years of use often in very high winds. This motorcycle cove is excellent! It stays on quite well and has already stood up to 70 mph gusts while on the outskirts of a storm and it held up very well and most important, it stayed on the bike with no problem at all. I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Musicman

customer_reviews.title: Very loose fitting.  A drawstring would be helpful.
customer_reviews.text: Good cover. It fits my Husqvarna Svartpilen with plenty of room to spare. My only complaints are that there is no drawstring around the opening and the elastic doesn’t go all the way around. I live where it’s often windy and without the drawstring, it’s hard to secure it enough that it doesn’t blow off. Also, I worry about putting it on my motorcycle after riding and the engine is hot. I haven’t burned a hole in it yet so maybe it’s more durable than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jahnke

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price - time will tell.
customer_reviews.text: I got the XXL for my 2017 HD Ultra Limited. It was just a bit to tight for my comfort level - it worries me about the paint. I ordered the 3XL and it fit very well. I wish it had soft cloth interior and venting. Also, you need to let your bike cool down before putting it on. The bottom layer is NOT heat proof. For the price - it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: OWen

customer_reviews.title: Super heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Edit 4/12/19 pic. Is on a Harley Ultra Classic. Here's the story. We (against all advice) covered out Harley bagger in our truck bed with this. It stayed on for about 300 miles. No rub off on the paint. OK because of my shoddy tie down job, I looked in the mirror and had a giant orange and black flag flying behind my truck at 70mph. It had come off and spun like a noose around my clutch lever. Pulled over, took it off expecting it to be in tatters. Not one rip or tear. Will be using this for the same job on our next trip but will tie it down better. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Pappy

customer_reviews.title: If you have a Motorcycle that has bags don’t buy from any company on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a cover that would fit my boyfriends bike. To say it plain and simple, if you have a bike that has a faring or bags don’t use any company on Amazon. I tried all the companies to see if any of them would fit anything with bags and none of them do. Might as well save you some time.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Lunn

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of sizing, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I keep my ride inside a barn, so I can't say totally how well this cover holds up to being in direct exposure 24/7. However the material seems extremely robust and durable. I bought this cover for the size, looking for something that would drape over a Drifter 800 easily. It does work well, but gets a little tight on the bars and controls - I think this cover was made specifically for a taller bike, and not so much a wider one, so if you have beach bars, be aware of this. Also, on nights when I have left the machine outside I have noticed condensation on the seat and fenders...just something to be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Shundler

customer_reviews.title: Best daily outdoor cover for wind UV and rain.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for sunlight holds up against high winds when the straps are tightened down correctly which is easier every time you learn easy after a few times. Water proof. Covers the entire moto no matter what size. Only cover that's fast to take on and off while still being good for outside. Protects paint against UV rays 100%. However the bike will get warm due to heat being trapped if in direct sunlight, but not hot enough to bother me. However, I use it under a tree so it stays cool.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fits a Heritage Softtail Harley Davidson perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my Harley Davidson Heritage Soft tail It fits great !
customer_reviews.author: Riley Peery

customer_reviews.title: Very well built cover
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my Kawasaki Vulcan 900 about two months ago I thought I would share how it is working so far. It is a very good cover and is standing up great. It is waterproof and stays on the bike even in some really strong winds we have had. I would definitely buy it again if I needed one. Also it is a great looking cover as well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan I Strong

customer_reviews.title: This works great for my Silverwing 600!
customer_reviews.text: So I live in the mountains, and obviously, we get lots of snow in the wintertime. We recently had some snow; this did great to deflect the snow from getting on my bike. The buckles work well to keep this tethered to the bike in high winds. A few times since I've bought it has rained; this cover has kept my bike dry. I don't try to throw it on my bike when it's still hot, so I can't speak to it's heat resistance. For the price, this is absolutely a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Nick L

customer_reviews.title: fit my 2018 indian bobber perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This cover is super lightweight so easy to get on and off. Cannot say much about outdoor endurance as it is parked in a parking garage. They did powerwash the concrete (which is why I bought this) and it protected the bike from any spray or damage from that. you can see the wash marks on the ground right up to my tires too. Attaches nice and secure with the buckles that go under the tires.
customer_reviews.author: Chance Dite

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: REALLY nice cover at rhis price, heavy and XXL fits Electraglide like it was made for it. Easy secure snaps, well worth it, only others better are over 100. I have had a few covers and this is quality, great deal for a very good quality cover. I only rated lower to acknowledge there are better covers but not under $100. And not with the look or features.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Oliver, Swedesboro

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit my 1800 goldwing I bought xxl it’s way too small
customer_reviews.author: Rick Rackham

customer_reviews.title: XXL is not enough to cover the whole bike.
customer_reviews.text: I can't really tell anything about the water resistance or durability. This cover looks nice, but the largest available size is way too small for an accessorized VTX that used to be covered with a $20 cover from Walmart which unfortunately after more than 10 years isn't waterproof anymore. Also it had an inner layer of softer material to protect paint from scratching which this one does not have. Returning, hoping for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Zetorman

customer_reviews.title: Only a cover for a unused bike
customer_reviews.text: This cover was a great cover until it was placed on the bike after riding one day and it completely melted onto the exhaust pipe. After multiple uses I never had this issue but I guess it's not heat resistant like many other covers that can handle being put on a hot exhaust. Great if you plan on not riding and just covering your bike from the outer elements.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and durable material! Only had it a few weeks but it's has rained, snowed, high winds and even used right after riding while pipes where still hot and no damage to product! I have a 2002 honda cbr 1100xx BLACKBIRD and 2005 Vulcan 800 and it fits both with room to spare while still firing properly! Only reason it's not receiving a 5 star is havent had it long enough! But if it holds up it will be the only one I recommend!!! Best purchase for protecting my toys!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hobert Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Good value for lightweight cover
customer_reviews.text: I've tried it out for a couple of months in the California Sun. The parts of the cover that are in the direct sunlight did fade but the materials holding together well. And in the rain he kept most of the water out but there was still coming Sation on the bike itself. Still for lightweight inexpensive cover I'm happy with it. XR650L the fit what's just right.
customer_reviews.author: opiz

customer_reviews.title: Protects my motorcycle well enough
customer_reviews.text: It keeps the rain off my bike, but will leave condensation on it (not much you can do to prevent that). The cover appears to be taking a real beating from the sun this summer. It's started to fade a little, but I'm just glad it's saving my motorcycle from the sun. I've never owned another cover, so I don't know how the weight compares, but it's not light enough to throw in a draw string bag with other items.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I currently have the cover on a bike (Harley Wide Glide) that is parked outside. Went through five days of severe thunderstorms including hail. The cover stayed on the bike and suffered no damage from winds up to 70mph and the hail. Overall a very good cover. Not in the same class as a Harley cover but about 1/5th the cost. I liked it so much I ordered another.
customer_reviews.author: KLH

customer_reviews.title: Large and fits my scooter
customer_reviews.text: Good cover for my Piaggio MP3. I had tried other covers but since I have a tall windshield, no other cover would fit, not to mention they were much more expensive. I’m not sure it’s the greatest quality, and the water resistance leaves some room for improvement, but I am very satisfied with the fact that it covers and protects my scooter. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: setarpocet

customer_reviews.title: Probably ok in warmer areas but will see after winter hits
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be like an indoor dust cover. May be an all season cover in California but definitely not in colder climates with snow etc. I plan on using it and my old cover in winter. After finally trying cover on bike I can say these do not fit a full size Harley. Had to take tour pack off just to get it on and still a really tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: tdub

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy this to protect my bike in the Florida downpours for a few weeks until my garage was available, and it was excellent. I didnt see any water intrusion at all, and the orange was great for visibility to prevent anyone from pulling into it at night. I can't see a cover being any better than this one at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Bubs

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 1996 Yamaha virago perfectly! Really good quality cover for the price. I need mostly all my things military grade or they don’t last, so appeasing me is kinda difficult but this cover met my standards for the price. a lot better than the regular cover you’d find at a parts store for 3 or 4 times the price. I’d buy it again. Even comes with a carrying case for you to take with you which is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fajardo

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover specifically to protect it from rain, as I have to keep my bike outside and it rains alot where I am. This cover isint water proof, when I remove the cover next day or after the rain stops, the seat and tank have lots of water on them. What's worse is that it holds the water in place because the cover sags rather then to allow for runoff, leading to spots on the seat and tank. Unhappy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: overall a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Came as described and on time. Packaged nicely and I have no complaints for the seller I bought this from. As for the cover: Had it for about 2 months now. Bike is kinda wet when I remove it after a heavy rainfall but overall I'm more worried about the sun. The cover does great against the sun so far. Bike stays nice and cool in direct 98° sunlight. No rips or tears yet. At this point I'm considering another purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Schuster

customer_reviews.title: VERY WELL MADE
customer_reviews.text: Over 50 years I've bought alot of motorcycle covers. This is one of the better ones and for the price, it's GREAT. The reflective tabs are a perk when used at night at a rally. The Harley colors I can tolerate - it's only a motorcycle cover. Excellent rain protection although I haven't had it in a deluge, merely heavy rains. I'd buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BeemerPilot

customer_reviews.title: Nice, big cover; but the straps can easily rip
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2001 Honda Shadow Aero with saddlebags and until this, I could not find a proper cover for this bike. Fits perfectly, but the straps were in a awkward position and it made clamping them very difficult. (Rear section was flat out impossible) And unfortunately the front straps flat out ripped when applying little pressure. I do like the size and it does keep the rain out, but be careful with the straps on this. Thankfully there are hoops I can use a bungee cable for. All in all, a great motorcycle cover but needs reinforced straps for the wheels
customer_reviews.author: Mr SoAndSo

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2017 BMW R1200GSA. It was a much more cost effective error and works just as well. It’s light weight but appears to be sturdy. Water beads up on it as expected. It’s a great size. It fits my bike well with a taller windscreen and all three cases on. It also comes in a small bag which I assume would be useful if you want to take it with you. It would be nice to see some ventilation built in to the cover, but so far I’ve seen no issues of condensation after a heavy rain.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Wrenn

customer_reviews.title: No thank you.
customer_reviews.text: So I read the reviews before I purchased and I am disappointed. I have a sportster. It’s a smaller bike. And it doesn’t even cover my front wheel. I have 14” bars on it but the over all height is shorter than my buddy’s Road glide with the mini windshield which the reviews say it fit. It doesn’t. And as for the “weatherproof” it rained a little bit last night not downpour and only for a short period of time but it soaked through. Overall not happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Christiana

customer_reviews.title: Handles freezing weather.
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel and the quality of craftmanship in this bike cover. We has several weeks where we had freezing weather down into the 20's and it did well. I am looking forward to placing a review after the winter has gone and spring comes. It is a bit big for my 85' Honda Rebel 250 but I'd rather have it a bit oversized than undersized. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this cover as secondary protection for my Yamaha Raider, as it is stored in a garage-in-a-box. I also used it to cover the bike while being trailered for 200 miles. By the end of the trip, one of the grommets had a tear around it, but other than that it held up well (I honestly expected it to be destroyed after 200 miles of hiway driving). I can't attest to the water resistance because I haven't had the bike outside in the rain with the cover on. Really can't go wrong though for the price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: EMT-1236

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and is very durable, but this thing is NOT waterproof at all. I keep a towel by my door to dry off the bike every day now. Even condensation goes right through the cover. The only thing this protects against is bird droppings and sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a great product. It looks very similar to the expensive harley davidson 1 my pop has for is road king. The XXL fits nicely on my 08 vrod with a windshield.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice and UV resistant
customer_reviews.text: We use these covers all season long until the bikes go into storage for the winter. This cover stays on the bike really well and still looks great while other covers fade under the UV light. Fits a large bike (wouldn't go over an XL Harley Streetglide) but fits anything below.
customer_reviews.author: Carsten

customer_reviews.title: This cover is very well made (as others have noted the fabric is very thick with a sturdy elastic band at the bottom)
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 bikes (two single bikes and one tandem) and couldn't find anything that would cover all three and be long enough for the tandem. This cover is very well made (as others have noted the fabric is very thick with a sturdy elastic band at the bottom). We can store all three bikes under this cover and the elastic band covers them fully right down to the bottom of the tires.
customer_reviews.author: joe a

customer_reviews.title: This will fit a Chopper bike!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I just recieved the motorcycle cover today, so not sure about the waterproofing just yet. But the fit is awesome! I have a 2010 Honda Fury which is a chopper type but factory. Was worried it wouldn't cover all of it, but aabyou can see in the photo, it does!! Feels very sturdy and well made. The trick to making it fit easier is to first undo the tie down buckles. Then start at the front and work your way back. After everything is covered, then you can connect the buckle straps. Might have to slip the front straps through the front wheel, but it will fit easily. Great Cover for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck T.

customer_reviews.title: Really liking this cover
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a much better value replacement for the now expensive Dowco Guardian mcycle cover and it's been great after several months of Spring/Summer use. It's seen high heat, and t-storms, and it's protected very well. The velcro ties are great to use when high winds are forecast.
customer_reviews.author: Eludium-Q36

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Great weather cover. Large size fits Honda Shadow with windshield and bags. Stays on well. Slight condensation on inside on very humid days. I think this is the case with any waterproof cover. For the price I bought two to use at different locations.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good buy. perfect fit on my Bagger
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits my Harley Road King Bagger Perfect !!! Full Coverage from front to rear, top to bottom Perfect fit. The only thing you can see is the bottom 2 inches of the tires. Unfortunately I haven't taken a picture of it on the bike but my bike should give u some idea on the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Fits Kawasaki Concours 1400 with top case and bags.
customer_reviews.text: The jury is still out on this one as I haven't gone through a snow season here in Utah yet. Other than that, it keeps the rain off and is quite visible...I'm sure the neighbors love the bright orange color. Quality seems good but I won't know whether I should have bought something heavier for another month or two once the snow hits.
customer_reviews.author: Bo W

customer_reviews.title: Fits 1993 Harley Fatboy
customer_reviews.text: Review of XYZCTEM cover, size XXL (up to 108 inches). Purchased for my 93 Fatboy (spec length 94.5 inches) with leather saddle bags and windshield. Windshield is a couple inches taller than original. Fits nicely with windshield and bags attached. Just got it, but overall quality appears to be good.
customer_reviews.author: Andy P

customer_reviews.title: Do it! It’s worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the buy. I bought one from Walmart (blue and grey one) and this is definitely made tougher and with more perks. The ends have an elastic to wrap the front and rear tire. The ends also have buckle that snaps so it doesn’t blow away. It has two ring holes for anti theft locks. I have yet to find a cover that fits snug unless it’s custom made and you want to pay extra money. It’s worth the buy I would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t really match the description
customer_reviews.text: The description says it’s breathable and soft on the inside. I haven’t used it yet so I can’t speak to it being breathable but the box doesn’t list that as a feature and it’s certainly not soft on the inside, there’s no difference between the inside and outside and it feels very similar to a tent. That said, it does cover a 2013 softail very nicely
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: the fit
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to cover my vespa scooter on the carport with this cover. Due to the standard size windshield, it would not cover the bottom sides. I know ,some say ,the bottom should have airflow,but I didn't want that. The wind blows the snow through the carport,so snow will get packed under the scooter. This is listed as xxl. I should have bought a xxxl. I'm not sure if it's any wider though. Quality i/e stitching and material are ok for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits well even on Harley with shield
customer_reviews.text: A decent cover for the money, good construction and well built. I like the 2 tie down straps and the option for a pad lock. Cover is a little short only because of my shied and will not cover the front wheel entirely, about 3 inches off ground and rear about 1 inch off ground. I am happy and would order another if they made one a little lower to cover wheels.
customer_reviews.author: razor

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2002 Suzuki VZ800 Marauder - Very Nice Cover
customer_reviews.text: The quality on this cover seems to be excellent. It fits my 2002 Suzuki VZ800 Marauder perfectly. I do not store my bike outside, so I can't speak to durability, but it seems to be very durable to the touch. I use it on my bike as a dust cover in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Doug K

customer_reviews.title: Not good for Harley bikes with apes bars.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Large size. It looks nice, I just got it so I can’t say much other than I won’t be able to use reason is that my Harley bars, my 12” apes. Other brands do cover. So if you have Harley with apes bars this will not cover your front tier.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little too much cover for my 2009 Gsxr but I like the wholes that allow me to lock the cover to the bike...I had a $130 Suzuki bike cover and someone came in front of my house and stole it...lets see them try to steal my cover now...
customer_reviews.author: Nikki TwoStep

customer_reviews.title: Great cover that won't blow off
customer_reviews.text: Several storms since I covered my bike. Has buckle straps I didn't know about, clipped them through front and rear tire so no worries about it blowing off! Bike has stayed dry and has reflective strips to keep it visible at night. More impressed than I thought I'd be, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erich Smith

customer_reviews.title: Did not cover our large tour bike but seemed good product
customer_reviews.text: This seemed to be a great product for the price .... unfortunately had to send it back because was not large enough to cover our 08 victory vision.
customer_reviews.author: MJ.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I like the cover, it's light and the price was fine. I have a 2006 Yamaha Royal Star TD and this cover doesn't come close to covering the whole bike like the picture. It's labeled as a XL for cruisers, but it's not near big enough. If you have a touring bike or Goldwing, it's going to be a disappointment. I'll keep it because I don't want the hassle of returning it. I'm just using it to keep the dust off.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Goff

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for an awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, convenient, and has withstood the Florida deluges time and time again. I have an F700GS with tail box and it fits nicely. The connectors that come at the front and rear tires are a really great idea and keep the cover on despite the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Jake and Amy

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husbands 2014 Harley Davidson Ultra Classic. We are using it to keep the dust off the bike while it’s in our garage. It has worked like a charm and is the perfect fit and has room for the touring pack once we put it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: FIT PERFECT?LOOKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This MC cover fit my 2014 Harley Soft Tail Deluxe CVO perfectly. Had a wind/rain storm last night, took cover off in AM, the bike was BONE DRY. Not even a single drop of rain. Very easy to put on & take off, even has elastic straps that latch through the wheels to keep cover from blowing off in wind. Elastic front and rear area to snug around the wheels. I am so impressed that I just ordered a second cover for inside my storage unit. The first cover will be used outside at my Condo.The only thing that could be better would be if the colors were reversed. Orange top/black bottom. Otherwise perfect, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me ..
customer_reviews.text: By mistake i ordered a big size but i’m totaly fine with it .. I think its perfect for me .. my motorcycle is parked under shade ‘ so i don’t know about heat resistant , water resistant or weatherproof ... as long as its saving my motorcycle from dust .. its perfect for me .. looks great ..
customer_reviews.author: maninderpal singh

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere for quality
customer_reviews.text: Ten mph winds and the draw straps snapped like rubber bands. If youre looking for a cover t ok protect your investment...look elsewhere. This thing is garbage. May be I got a defective one but burn me once .... bit over a month since purchase. I feel cheated. Managed to find another way to tie down the front with a cable and lock only to have the rings pull out of the fabric completely. I have never been so disgusted by anything purchased on Amazon. Thoroughly disappointed with this product. Do yourself a favor and DO NOT BUY THIS TRASH
customer_reviews.author: Bradford Harger

customer_reviews.title: Best for the Money..
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, Fits my Harley Fatboy, with room to spare.. Nothing to Dislike about this cover..
customer_reviews.author: Terry L

customer_reviews.title: Great solution.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. The bike lives in the garage most of the time, and this keeps it dust free. When I do keep it outside, it's well protected from morning moisture. Probably not the best for winter rain though. Light weight and easy to bring along in a saddle bag.
customer_reviews.author: C. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover has exceeded my expectations. I was very impressed that this cover withstood several heavy storms with high wind gusts and kept my bike clean and dry. It is so hot in Texas that the heat resistance does well but obviously it cannot block out 100% Texas heat but it has done well. This is an excellent cover choice for a bike. I ride a Kawasaki Ninja and this cover fits it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Venessa Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent covers!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality covers. Already better than any I've bought in the past and for the price...you can't beat that!! It's fun to watch the water just bead up and roll of them. And I'm not worried about the snow that's coming tonight. I will recommend these to all my biker friends! Thanks!!! Satisfied biker chick
customer_reviews.author: Michellica

customer_reviews.title: To short for VTX 1800r
customer_reviews.text: The cover seems to be constructed nicely the only problem is they claimed an 1800 VTX is compatible with this cover I'm here to tell you it is not compatible with the 1800r the r has the extended fender in the back and makes it a little too long. The cover will stretch over the fender but it makes it too tight to pull it all the way to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: John L Robinson

customer_reviews.title: But its still awesome.
customer_reviews.text: lining around bottom came out 2 weeks in. But its still awesome. 2 year update it lasted through 3 seasons for $20! outstanding!! The sun weakened the fabric on top and a few spots and it has torn in the folds of these areas. I have bought much more expensive covers over the years. Btw this will not fit my with my tourpak on. This year buying next biggest size up!
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Aero Man

customer_reviews.title: Decent dust cover but will not keep your bike dry.
customer_reviews.text: A nice looking cover with a nice fit for my 2019 Heritage Softail. It will keep the dust out but thats about it. This will not keep your bike dry as just morning dew slips through. I would also like to see a couple vents.
customer_reviews.author: GaryH

customer_reviews.title: Not Weatherproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it states it’s weatherproof. We have some foggy mornings lately but nothing terrible. Fully covered my bike snugly, which I liked a lot. I removed it yesterday morning to find my bike completely wet! Not weatherproof!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah C

customer_reviews.title: Motorcycle Cover XL
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the price of this cover , even though my bike is garage kept this will keep the dust off of it, when our this will keep prying eyes off it . This size XL fits my Custom Harley perfectly . Nice reflective ribbons for night parking, even the Orange helps with brightness of the cover. Overall good cover no complaints very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny S

customer_reviews.title: Very good .. while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cover I've had .... but on the downside, it lasted a little over 12 months before rotting through in the Florida sun. -- UPDATE = 2nd purchase = "All Season Waterproof Outdoor Protection" lasted - Lasted 10 months in the sun before splitting down the middle from rot. .
customer_reviews.author: BSchauerte

customer_reviews.title: Quality is fantastic and it looks even better!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my item today and put to use immediately. It fit a little big on my 2009 Yamaha R6 which is exactly what i wanted! It did come with straps and while they are not bad it did need some backyard engineering to make it work(Basically put it through and tie it with a knot). Quality feels great and it looks even better!. If you are in the market for a affordable anf quality cover you can't go wrong with any of their products. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Not as described.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I was happy until it rained and the water leaked through the cover all over my bike. Also- my fishtail pipes ripped the fabric after two days of usage. I spent $30 more and got a Much better cover made by Ugari.
customer_reviews.author: James Vincent Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is for a 2019 ktm 1290 super adventure r. It fits great without the top box and with the side bags. Perfect size. There are two straps that fit though the wheel to hold it in place so it doesn't blow away. I haven't had much time to test it but it fits wonderful. I didn't try it with the top box but I think it would be a little short in the back maybe?
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: Seems great!
customer_reviews.text: So far this product has been solid. Have had it for 2 weeks and it has been great. Feels durable, i like the buckles in the front and rear because they do a nice work keeping the cover on during windy days. Let's see how it does during the Texas sunny and hot summer.
customer_reviews.author: lazaro monroy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to fit my Yamaha 650 vstar classic pretty well. Not sure about durability, will update after a while. The latches which go through seem to keep it from blowing off in windy conditions, so that is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Smith

customer_reviews.title: A Large, Durable Cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover looks nice, is plenty large enough for a cruiser bike and resists weather and water well. It looks nice too. There are straps and clips on the front and back to keep it from rising. It’s definitely not cheap or flimsy looking and feeling.
customer_reviews.author: CLH

customer_reviews.title: great cover
customer_reviews.text: looks exactly as shown, bike has stayed dry except on very damp days , i think its condesation so i suggest you uncover to dry out but as for actual rain its always dry. great product would reccomend. seat does get super hot even covered so i put a towel down underneath so you can sit on it right away.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer rackley

product_meta.title: XYZCTEM Motorcycle Cover – All Season Waterproof Outdoor Protection – Precision Fit up to 108 Inch Tour Bikes, Choppers and Cruisers – Protect Against Dust, Debris, Rain and Weather(XXL,Black& Orange)
product_meta.description:
Whether you drive a cruiser, “crotch rocket” or moped, it’s important to keep your motorcycle clean from the weather above.

Click ‘Add to Cart’ now to start protecting your Harley Davidson, Honda Goldwing or other large cruisers with all-season, waterproof protection.
feature_bullets: IMPROVED WEATHER PROTECTION – Made of high quality NYLON OXFORD material,protect your motorcycle against rain, dust, tree & inclement weather with top to bottom coverage.
BREATHABLE FABRIC – Unlike other car and vehicle covers that trap heat, our breathable bike cover releases heat and water to protect your seat.
UNIVERSAL FIT – Designed to fit multiple motorcycles up to 108 inch—from Harley Davidson to Honda,Suzuki to Kawasaki,Yamaha—our cover fits most on and off-road standard-sized bikes.
GENTLE ON FACE– Protect your vehicle with a premium motorcycle cover that’s non-scratch,lightweight and soft on face.

24 Hours Service &ENHANCE DURABILITY – Feel free to contact us if any issue we will provide serive in 24 Hours,Each motorcycle cover is made with double-stitched, windproof fabric that stands up to even the toughest weather.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,846 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
